piccross

Class PiccrossView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • piccross.PiccrossView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PiccrossView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Picross class represents our frame in Picross game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  PiccrossView.CheckBoxHandler
      ItemListener for Mark Check Box as inner class inside Picross class.
      private static class  PiccrossView.debugConfig1
      ActionListener for debug sub menu debug configuration 1 which will create a predefined game that all outside boxes are correct.
      private static class  PiccrossView.debugConfig2
      ActionListener for debug sub menu debug configuration 2 which will create a predefined game that only the middle box is correct.
      private static class  PiccrossView.debugConfig3
      ActionListener for debug sub menu debug configuration 3 which will create a predefined game that all boxes are false.
      private class  PiccrossView.disconnect
      This class will implement ActionListener and disconnects from server if selected from menu.
      private class  PiccrossView.exit
      ActionListener for exit item on menu which will exit the game.
      private static class  PiccrossView.hoverToggle
      This method will implement ActionListener and will enable or disable hover feature of the game.
      private class  PiccrossView.newGame
      ActionListener for new game item on menu which will create a new random game.
      private class  PiccrossView.openConnection
      This class will implement ActionListener and will open a dialog box to get information from user and try connects to server.
      (package private) class  PiccrossView.PicrossNetworkController
      This class which extends Thread will be used to run the network controller thread so while we are reading messages from server user will be still able to play the game.
      private class  PiccrossView.reset
      ActionListener for restarting the game and timer.
      private class  PiccrossView.setSize10
      This class will implement ActionListener and will set the size of game to 10*10 when selected from menu.
      private class  PiccrossView.setSize15
      This class will implement ActionListener and will set the size of game to 15*15 when selected from menu.
      private class  PiccrossView.setSize5
      This class will implement ActionListener and will set the size of game to 5*5 when selected from menu.
      private static class  PiccrossView.showAbout
      ActionListener for show about in menu which will pop up a dialog windows and shows information regarding software.
      private class  PiccrossView.showSolution
      ActionListener for show solution in menu which will mark the correct game moves with green color.
      private class  PiccrossView.textAreaListener
      This class will implement KeyListener and will implement the lister for console input text area so when ever user press enter key it will execute the code.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static PiccrossNetworkModalVC connect
      PiccrossNetworkModalVC object which will be used as backend of dialog box for connecting to server.
      (package private) boolean connected
      Represents a boolean value that shows if we are connected to a server or not.
      private javax.swing.JTextField consoleInput
      Represents the input area where user can enter commands or chat with other players when connected to server.
      private javax.swing.JPanel consoleInputPanel
      Represents the area where user can see the output from the game and server.
      private static javax.swing.JTextArea consoleOutputTextArea
      consoleOutputTextArea will display outputs to the player.
      private javax.swing.JPanel consolePanel
      consolePanel will hold point panel, timer panel and scroll pane inside it self.
      private static boolean debug
      Represents if we are debugging the code or not.
      private static int debugMode
      Represents the game mode we want to play.
      (package private) static java.lang.String gameBoolVec
      Represents the game in 0 and 1 for sending it to server.
      private static boolean gameIsDone
      used to indicate if the game is finished.
      private static int gridSize
      Represents the grid size for our game for example 5 means 5x5 grid.
      private static boolean hover
      Represents if we are showing hover in our UI or not.
      (package private) java.io.BufferedReader input
      Represents the input received from server to client.
      private javax.swing.JLabel logoLabel
      logoLabel will hold the logo to our Picross game.logoLabel is placed at PAGE_START of markAndLogoPanel.
      private static PiccrossView mainFrame
      represents our JFrame which will be the only frame we will use in this game.
      private javax.swing.JPanel markAndLogoPanel
      markAndLogoPanel will hold logo and mark panel.
      private javax.swing.JCheckBox MarkCheckBox
      MarkCheckBox will display a message if its change and display another message if set to uncheck.MarkCheckBox is placed at CENTER of markAndLogoPanel.
      private javax.swing.JMenuBar menuBar
      Used to add menu bar to UI.
      private javax.swing.JMenuItem menuItemConnect
      Represents the JMenuItem object for connecting to server.
      private javax.swing.JMenuItem menuItemDisconnect
      Represents the JMenuItem object for disconnect to server.
      (package private) static java.io.PrintStream out
      Represents the out going string or output from client to server.
      private PiccrossModel piccrossModel
      panels we are using in our frame
      private javax.swing.JLabel pointLabel
      pointLabel will display "Points : " in our Picross game.pointLabel is a label inside pointPanel.
      private javax.swing.JPanel pointPanel
      pointPanel will hold pointTextField.pointPanel is placed at NORTH of consolePanel.
      private javax.swing.JButton resetButton
      resetButton will restart our game (CURRENTLY NOT WORKING).
      private javax.swing.JScrollPane scrollerScrollPane
      scrollerScrollPane will hold consoleOutputTextArea and will add scroll ability to it.scrollerScrollPane is placed at SOUTH of consolePanel.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      default serial version ID - Swing components implement the Serializable interface.
      (package private) static java.net.Socket socket
      Represents the socket that we make the connection to server.
      (package private) java.lang.Thread thread
      Represents a thread which will run the PicrossNetworkController run method.
      private static ControllableTimer timer
      Represents the object of ControllableTimer class which is used for timer.
      private static javax.swing.JLabel timerLabel
      timerLabel will display the current time of playing game.timerLabel is a component of timerPanel.
      private javax.swing.JPanel timerPanel
      timerPanel which will show the time since game has been started.
      private javax.swing.JPanel westPanel
      westPanel represent the panel on left side of frame.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PiccrossView

        public PiccrossView()
        Picross class object constructor.

      • PiccrossView

        public PiccrossView(java.net.Socket socket,
                    javax.swing.JTextArea consoleOutputTextArea,
                    boolean connected)
        Picross class object constructor that will be called if a new game is called after running the initial game.
        Parameters:
        socket - represents clients socket object which holds the connection to server.
        consoleOutputTextArea - represents the JTextArea where program and server will output their information.
        connected - represents the boolean value that shows if client is connected to server or not.

    • Method Detail

      • startGUI

        public int startGUI(int gameSize)
        This method will created a new frame, setups the the frame and the grid and then add the other panels and components.
        Parameters:
        gameSize - represents the game size set by user. By difficult this value is 5 for 5*5 game but can be changed to anything.
        Returns:
        it will return a integer not -1 shows method has been run. successfully if -1 shows there was error.

      • getTimer

        public static ControllableTimer getTimer()
        This method is a getter to timer object.
        Returns:
        Returns timer object which is ControllableTimer object that used to start stop restart and terminal the timer.

      • getTimerLabel

        public javax.swing.JLabel getTimerLabel()
        This method is a getter to timer object.
        Returns:
        Returns timerLabel object which is JLabel object that used to show time that user spent on each game.

      • getTimeElapsed

        public static java.lang.String getTimeElapsed(int elapsed)
        This method will calculate the time that our game has been running and returns it as string in proper format.
        Parameters:
        elapsed - represents the time since the game started.
        Returns:
        String is returned to the calling which will be the time since game has been started.

      • getGameBoolVec

        public static java.lang.String getGameBoolVec()
        This method is a getter to String gameBoolVec object.
        Returns:
        Returns gameBoolVec which represent the game in string format as 0 and 1 which will be used to send the game to server.

      • getConsoleOutputTextArea

        public static javax.swing.JTextArea getConsoleOutputTextArea()
        This method is a getter to JTextArea consoleOutputTextArea which represents the text area that user will see output of program or server.
        Returns:
        Returns consoleOutputTextArea.

        This method will create the menu and sub menus and add the specific action listener to each item.

        public static int getGridSize()
        This method is a getter for gridSize.
        Returns:
        gridSize which will represent number of boxes in our grid.

      • getDebug

        public static boolean getDebug()
        This method is a getter for debug variable which if set to true it will show additional info on console .
        Returns:
        debug is used to debug the code.

      • getHover

        public static boolean getHover()
        This method is a getter for hover variable which if set to true it will add hove option to the game but currently its a bit buggy so default is set to false.
        Returns:
        hover which will represents if we are showing hover of the mouse in our UI or not.

      • getSocket

        public static java.net.Socket getSocket()
        This method is a getter for Socket which represents the socket that clients makes the connection to server.
        Returns:
        Returns socket which is client socket from client to server.

      • isGameIsDone

        public static boolean isGameIsDone()
        This method is a getter for gameIsDone variable.
        Returns:
        gameIsDone represents if game has been finished or not.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        This method will send a message in string to server. It can be command, or it can be just regular chat.
        Parameters:
        message - Represents the message in String entered by user.

      • checkMessage

        public int checkMessage(java.lang.String message)
        This method will check the message entered by user and tries to match which one of the case below.
        Parameters:
        message - Represents the message in String entered by user.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 and 1, if 0 means send the message to server, if 1 it means do not send message to server and message will be used locally.

      • setGameIsDone

        public static void setGameIsDone(boolean gameIsDone)
        This method is a setter for gameIsDone.
        Parameters:
        gameIsDone - represents if game has been finished or not.
